EmailTemplate.name: 2016Q3.Global.NUR.1739.Airscale.Email 6 - SRAN Executive Summary
EmailTemplate.subject: Start today to prepare for 5G and IoT
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
AirScale Base Station with Single RAN software AirScale Radio Access The future just got simpler Modernizing to Single RAN <[[http://networks.nokia.com/portfolio/products/mobile-broadband/single-ran-advanced]]> lowers base station costs by 30% through less hardware, lower site rental, reduced energy use and simple operations.
Cut costs even further with the 60% more energy efficient Nokia AirScale Base Station. Read the Executive Summary <[[http://networks.nokia.com/file/27406/nokia-single-ran-advanced-executive-summary?download]]> © 2016 Nokia.
